overview: Hot young lass Bunny runs out on the vicious Mr. Fritz. Brutish masked wrestler Arcano, venomous femme fatale Illmiora, and Illmiora's equally spiky partner Cherie all go looking around the city trying to find the evasive Bunny while amiable nice guy Luigi finds himself caught in the middle of the whole chaotic mess.
tagline: Everyone Wants To Get Bunny ... The Most Wanted Woman in the City!
title: Run Run Bunny!
